events.name: Zentangle Art Class
events.description:
The Zentangle method is a relaxing, fun, and easy-to-learn way to create beautiful art works using repeating patterns. In this two hour class, you will get to learn a number of Zentangle patterns. The teacher will then guide you along to plan out your very own creation on your tote bag. No two designs will be the same. Colour blending will taught and by the end of the lesson, you will have a beautiful (and useful) art work that you can take home.
Not an artist? No worries. You don't need any drawing skills to learn about the Zentangle method. Step-by-step instructions will be provided, and if you can draw a line and a circle- you can do this. Join this class and unleash your creativity today.
Join our weekly classes held at 
Venue : Stag Match at Junction 10, #02-10. 
Date/Time : 4th June 2017 (Sunday),  10am to 12pm.
Course Fees : $80 per pax (every 4 lessons), $10 (material fees) payable directly to the trainer.
Payment Mode : Cash.

Hurry, Sign up now!! Limited Slot Available!!!
